title: Apple Watch Displayed Beautifully with xylum's Boldly Designed Charging Stand, Launches on Kickstarter
text:
xylumâ€™s elegant dock for the Apple Watch has cutting edge functionality with a modern and minimalistic look. A timeless design, machined from a solid piece of aircraft grade aluminum.
San Francisco, CA
xylum , the most beautiful and simplest way to charge your Apple Watch, today launched its crowdfunding campaign for its charging dock/stand on Kickstarter .
xylum is made to dock the Apple Watch while making a progressive design statement as a stealth alternative to tangled charging cords and inputs.
It's also a bold accessory reminiscent of the finest modern watches, created from a solid piece of aircraft grade aluminum - expertly milled to ensure rigidity and strength.
When the Apple Watch is being attached or removed, two rubber inserts secure the cable and the magnetic charging mechanism stays in place.
With its minimalistic design and contrasting matte body finish that features chamfered edges, xylum complements any setting perfectly. Whether on a nightstand, a desk or in the living room, it fits any style. Its timeless accents transcend timekeeping into a new era.
Early bird specials, on xylum's Kickstarter page , start at $49. It's available in three wristband compatibilities; All Sport, Modern Buckle, and Classic Buckle, and 3rd party wristbands with two separate pieces may also be made compatible.
xylum is available on Kickstarter up until 5pm PT, Oct.28, 2015 at: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/904744483/xylum-apple-watch-charging-dock-stand?ref=nav_search
